statements: DELETE FROM perishable_items WHERE expiration_date < DATE('now')
DELETE FROM perishable_items WHERE item_name LIKE '%Milk%'
DELETE FROM perishable_items WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN DATE('now') AND DATE('now', '+7 days')
DELETE FROM perishable_items WHERE item_id = 1 AND expiration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM stock WHERE stock_id = 10 AND quantity = 0;
DELETE FROM perishable_items WHERE item_id IN (SELECT item_id FROM stock WHERE quantity < 5);
DELETE FROM perishable_items WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE;
DELETE FROM categories WHERE id IN (SELECT DISTINCT category_id FROM item_categories WHERE item_id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM perishable_items));
DELETE FROM stores WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT item_id FROM item_categories);
DELETE FROM item_categories WHERE category_id IN (SELECT category_id FROM categories WHERE category_name = 'Dairy');
DELETE FROM perishable_items WHERE item_id NOT IN (SELECT item_id FROM supply_history);
